programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Just Eat
programme.desc: In the new culinary show Just Eat, celebrities reveal their favorite chefs and memorable dishes. This series explores how these culinary experiences have impacted their lives, from overcoming personal struggles to finding new career paths. Join us to discover the flavors and stories that resonate with these well-known personalities.

programme.title: Hot Door Night
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: The Sound of Happiness
programme.desc: Wu is a senior police officer has always wanted a son to carry his family name and join the force. However, he and wife are bequeathed with four daughters! As a doting father, his chief objective is to help them find happiness in their marriages. In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: Everything Under Control
programme.desc: During a diamond heist, one of the security escorts, Jelly, steals the diamonds and flees. Fellow security escorts, Yau Shing and Penguin, are forced to help the robber track down the diamonds. They stumble onto a remote village along the way, encountering strange villagers and mysterious incidents. Can they finally locate Jelly and the diamonds?

programme.title: Trending Topic
programme.desc: Chen Miao, an online media editor-in-chief, wrote a popular article which has become a trending topic. This however, led indirectly to a girls suicide. After receiving a help request, she realises that there is more to the story than meets the eye. As public opinion sways on the case, a war to speak up for the weak has begun!

programme.title: Burning Blood
programme.desc: Narcotics squad membersTai Hua, Lao Mi, Ah Feng, and Ah Tangare involved in arresting a drug lord. However, a betrayal within the police leads to the deaths of Ah Feng and his superior, while Ah Tang vanishes. As Tai Hua and Lao Mi uncover the truth, they find themselves torn between loyalty and betrayal in their fight against the drug cartel.

programme.title: Lucky Star 2015
programme.desc: When a talent manager meets a guy whose voice resembles the famous comedian Stephen Chow, things starts to stir up in the show biz. "Lucky Star 2015" is a hilarious comedy starring actors from both Hong Kong and Taiwan, including Eric Tsang, Dada Chan and Wong Cho Lam.

programme.title: The Invisible Guest
programme.desc: Young and beautiful entrepreneur Joanna is a prime suspect in a locked-room murder where her lover is found dead. She pays off a police officer to prove her innocence. During the investigation, they discover another murder case involving Joanna and her lover, and eventually reveals the truth.

programme.title: The Grey Men
programme.desc: Hong Kong police officer Ah Shan goes undercover in prison to gain the trust of criminal Tian, in order to seek evidence against his gang. After their release from jail, Shan helps Tian rise within the gang and become the new boss. However, just as Shan successfully cracks down on the gang, he uncovers a shocking secret about Tian...

programme.title: Lost Love
programme.desc: Mei tries to get over the death of her young son by becoming a foster parent. For 13 years, Meis dedication to the foster child leads her to neglect her husband and the true needs of the child. It is only through the childs unintentional help that the couple finally manages to salvage their relationship.

programme.title: Ip Man 3
programme.desc: When some gangsters led by a ruthless American property developer force a school to sell their land, Ip Man fights to protect it. Subsequently, Ip Man is challenged by another Wing Chun master Zhang Tian Zhi for the Grandmaster title. Ip Man accepts the challenge for the sake of his family and disciples, and wins the duel for the title.

programme.title: The Italian Recipe
programme.desc: Famous pop idol Peng travels to Rome for a reality show and encounters an ordinary girl, Mang, who dreams of becoming a great chef after migrating to Italy. Peng and Mang have nothing in common but spend a magical night in Rome together. Their lives begin to change as the two start to fall in love.

programme.title: Initial D
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from a famous Japanese manga. 18-year-old Takumi delivers tofu in his father's near-obsolete car every day and becomes a good racer with perfect drifting skill. Encouraged by his father, he joins a mountain race and unexpectedly wins it, making him famous overnight and leading him from one exciting race to another.

programme.title: All U Need is Love
programme.desc: Ten major film companies join forces on a comedy-drama film to raise funds and create jobs for industry workers during the COVID-19 pandemic. This film features an all-star ensemble cast starring for free, with the story revolving around a group of hotel guests placed under quarantine in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Ready O/R Rot
programme.desc: Guy and Heidi are finally getting married but pressure from Guys mother creates much friction between them. Meanwhile, Grey Bear suspects his wife of cheating on him and Ken faces the biggest crisis of his life when Jessica accidentally gets pregnant. Can they eventually solve their relationship problems?

programme.title: Bodyguards and Assassins
programme.desc: On 15 October 1906, Chinese revolutionary leader Sun Yat Sen returned to Hong Kong to stage another overthrow of the Qing dynasty. Businessman Lee and Chinese Dailys Chief Chan arrange for five bodyguards to protect Mr Sun - these are all extraordinary fighters who are ready and up for fierce battles against the Qing assassination army.

programme.title: The Grey Men
programme.desc: Hong Kong police officer Ah Shan goes undercover in prison to gain the trust of criminal Tian, in order to seek evidence against his gang. After their release from jail, Shan helps Tian rise within the gang and become the new boss. However, just as Shan successfully cracks down on the gang, he uncovers a shocking secret about Tian...

programme.title: May We Chat
programme.desc: Yan, Wei Wei and Yi Ji are three troubled young women from very different backgrounds who met on We Chat, a social media platform, and will do anything to escape each of their troubled lives. When Yan suddenly disappears one day, Wei Wei and Yi Ji start to track her whereabouts, only to find out shocking truths about her that were never revealed.

programme.title: The Mask of Shura of Fire Cloud
programme.desc: 18 years ago, the evil Black Feather clan infiltrated the territory of Master Fire Cloud and stole The Mask of Shura, thus releasing an evil spirit that was a baby. Master Fire Cloud adopted the baby to prevent him from becoming evil. When the baby grows up, he takes control of the mask and becomes Fire Clouds successor as the citys guard.

programme.title: Stand Up Story
programme.desc: Mancer knows his father Wah is intellectually challenged since young and has to take care of him after his mother left them. When Mancer discovers and finds solace in stand-up comedy, he learns that hardships provide the best comedic material - from his own school ridicule experience to pandemic woes, misery can fuel laughter!

programme.title: Kung Fu Dunk
programme.desc: Shi Jie grew up in a martial arts school and possesses an extraordinary shooting skill. Street hustler Chen Li sees his talent and arranges for him to join a university basketball team. With his kung fu dunking skill, Shi Jie manages to win all college basketball matches, bringing him wealth and also strengthening his relationship with Chen Li.

programme.title: Mama's Affair
programme.desc: Former talent manager Mei Fung stays home to take care of her husband and son after retirement. She decides to re-enter the entertainment business to find her value in life, and successfully transforms a local restaurant delivery boy, Fong Ching, into a young pop idol. This makes her teenage son, Jonathan, intensely jealous of Fong Ching.

programme.title: The Brotherhood of Rebel
programme.desc: Chai, a triad member, helps his childhood friend Meow flee Hong Kong after discovering that Meow attempted to kill his triad boss. 17 years later, Chai becomes a key member of the triad. When he runs into Meow one day, he knows that his gang will kill Meow if they find him. Caught between triad and brotherhood, what will Chai choose?

programme.title: My Blue Summer
programme.desc: Zhi has been secretly in love with Nan since she met him once as a child. After graduating high school, Zhi realizes that she and Nan are in the same university, where they get to know each other by chance and become close friends. However, Zhi is still too shy to express her love for Nan. Will this long-term crush finally turn into true love?

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau II
programme.desc: Mark, the chief accountant of a money-laundering syndicate, has stolen US$15 billion from the fund and absconded to Thailand with his daughter. Interpol agent Lok seeks help from Ken, the God of Gamblers, to capture the syndicates mastermind. As they search for Mark to testify in the case, Ken reunites with the love of his life

programme.title: Reunion Dinner
programme.desc: Chao Yang and Zi Hong are soon to wed but both have not met the other's parents. When a client requests for a livestream of their reunion dinner to promote his products, it set the stage for their parents' first meeting. Estranged from his mother, Yang decides to rent a family for the dinner which results in a series of mishaps and hilarity.

programme.title: Love Punch
programme.desc: Talented boxer Jia Yang is caught in an underground fight to clear her father's debts. She loses her Olympic aspiration and vanishes from the boxing world. 10 years later, Coach Li Yue is determined to help her honour her father's wish by returning to the ring. As passion and obligation collide, can Jia Yang revive her abandoned boxing dream?

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 2009
programme.desc: Successful businesswoman Yu Chu has no chance of finding a husband with her insufferable personality, much to the consternation of her younger brother Yu Bo, who due to a curse, will fail in love until his sister gets married. Yu Bo hires a love expert, Dick, to woo his sister. Smitten at first sight, Yu Chu is not about to let Dick get away...

programme.title: The Unwavering Brotherhood
programme.desc: The revered elder of a triad gang faces succession uncertainty when his three trusted underlingsHua, Fei, and Guoare robbed while transporting gang money. Determined to redeem himself, Hua vows to track down the robbers. However, when Hua discovers that Fei and Guo are connected to the robbery, he must choose between loyalty and brotherhood.

programme.title: The Ex-Files 4: Marriage Plan
programme.desc: Two brothers, Meng Yun and Yu Fei, are of marriageable age and are facing challenges in love. Yun dodges family pressure to marry after his breakup, while Fei and his girlfriend opt for a marriage cooling-off period to tackle marriage issues.

programme.title: From Beijing With Love
programme.desc: Stephen Chow writes, directs & stars in this hilarious James Bond spoof that sees the Chinese government assign their worst secret agent (Chow) to recover a stolen dinosaur skull.

programme.title: As It Burns
programme.desc: Detective Wei investigates the death of Yan Zhen in an explosion which seems more than an accident to him. Wei then finds out that Yan Zhen looks a lot like Yin, the girlfriend of Yan Zhens childhood friend Lu, and uncovers a tangled web of deceit leading to surprising revelations when he merges details from the past and the present.

programme.title: Saving General Yang
programme.desc: The Khitan army takes revenge for a past massacre by abducting General Yang Ye and setting up a deadly trap for the seven Yang brothers. Led by the eldest son, the seven brothers set out with a small band of fighters to bring their father home.

programme.title: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Amid the recession caused by the pandemic, debt-ridden wedding planner, Sheng, finds a lifeline as he transitions into a funeral planner. His unconventional approach leads to unexpected success, and his attitude toward his career and life is transformed after being inspired by the respected Master Wen.

programme.title: The Lost Bladesman
programme.desc: An epic historic adventure set during the turbulent times of the Three Kingdoms. Cao Cao attempts to enlist Guan Yu into his forces, but Guan is loyal to his sworn brother Liu Bei, who is also Caos enemy. As Guan tries to rescue Liu Beis concubine from Cao, he is forced to fight his way through. Can he succeed in the end?

programme.title: Village Of Tigers
programme.desc: The devilish residents of the Village of Tigers, led by Hu Jiao, plan to kill Lo Hong Shun, otherwise known as the heroic Sword of the Southern Sky. Hu Jiao sees a way to use the righteousness of the honorable Ba family to help him kill the hero Lo by turning them against him. Will good prevail over evil?

programme.title: The Younger Generation
programme.desc: A tragic tale about a young girl who gets married and has five kids. When she and her husband die, leaving all five kids behind to fend for themselves, the eldest child is forced to be sold into prostitution to feed the other four.

programme.title: The Deadly Breaking Sword
programme.desc: Warrior Tuan Chang Qing meets courtesan Liu Yin Xi in a small town. Liu pleads Tuan to kill the underworld master Guo Tian Sheng, known as the "Killer Doctor", in order to avenge the death of her fiance. Tuan and gambling addict Xiao Dao breaks into Guo's household, triggering the battle of good against evil.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: The story revolves around three lay disciples of the Shaolin Temple: Fang Shi Yu, Hong Xi Guan, and Hu Hui Qian. Monk Jie instructs them in martial arts, but their frequent competitions with fellow disciple Wu Qing spark rivalries. The once serene Shaolin Temple is plunged into chaos, yet even the abbot cannot help but be amused by their antics.

programme.title: The Eunuch
programme.desc: A year before Lo Wei directed Bruce Lee in Fist Of Fury, he wrote and co-starred in this tale of a treacherous devil who wants nothing less than supreme power...and doesn't care if he has to murder the Emperor and use his own daughter as a deadly dupe to get it.

programme.title: The Last Tempest
programme.desc: This sequel to The Empress Dowager continues the tale of Emperor Guangxu and Empress Dowager Cixi. Despite Guangxu's enthronement, his ability to rule effectively is overshadowed by the ever-present power of Cixi. When his attempts to reform the Imperial system are thwarted by the Empress Dowager, Guangxu attempts to curb her power.

programme.title: My Rebellious Son
programme.desc: A corrupt official attempts to steal a priceless Buddha statue from a temple to please a group of Westerners. Luckily, Doctor Zhang and his son manage to defeat the Western boxers, the Japanese Kendo opponents and the Western longsword fighters with Chinese kung fu, thus saving the Buddha statue.

programme.title: The Merry Wife
programme.desc: A 17-year old schoolgirl marries her 35-year-old teacher. Comedy ensues when they attempt to keep their relationship a secret despite being in the same school. When they discover unwanted suitors going after their other halves, jealousy threatens to expose their marriage any minute!

programme.title: The Lady Assassin
programme.desc: Two feuding princes fight for the throne in the Qing Dynasty, causing many injuries and deaths to the commoners. Can the lady assassin who is drawn into this royal feud execute her assassination mission in time to help one of the princes secure the throne?

programme.title: The Mad Monk Strikes Again
programme.desc: The Mad Monk is up against the equally legendary scholar-turned-genie, Lu Tung Pin. The duo create havoc as they vie with each other, be it in mirth, magic, women or weapons!

programme.title: Mr. Funnybone Strikes Again
programme.desc: In this hilarious sequel, Mr Big Potato opens an old-fashioned Chinese clinic, but his traditional methods are rejected by the sceptics of modern Hong Kong. Enter his buddy Mr Funny bone to rescue his business!

programme.title: The Brave Archer
programme.desc: On his way back to the midlands, Guo Jing meets Huang Rong and they quickly fall in love. However, Ouyang Ke proposes to marry Huang Rong at the same time, so Huang's father sets up a duel for the two men to compete for her hand. Guo Jing finally beats Ouyang Ke to win Huang Rong back.

programme.title: The Knight Of Knights
programme.desc: Wen Su Chen, the leader of seven knights, sends his six sworn brothers to investigate a monastery. Unfortunately, they are killed by an abbot who plans to murder Inspector Lin. Wen saved Lin and battles the abbot to avenge his dead sworn brothers. With Lin and his army's help, they bring down the ruthless monks in the monastery.

programme.title: Lover's Rock
programme.desc: Pan Lei, winner the China Literary Award for three consecutive years, wrote and directed this film about the lives and loves of a fishing village. It starred the glorious Cheng Pei-pei in her first film as a woman (she had debuted in a man's role), and her much-lauded performance won her the prestigious Golden Accolade Award from the International Association Of Independent Producers a first for any Asian woman.

programme.title: Ten Tigers Of Kwang Tung
programme.desc: The Ten Tigers of Kwang Tung is a group of anti-Ching martial artists who have killed a Ching official. Years later, when five disciples and descendants of Ten Tigers meet one night, one of them is killed by the son of the late Ching official who returns with a vengeance. They must fight against him to protect the Ten Tigers clan

programme.title: Torrent Of Desire
programme.desc: Rich playboy David is a drunk until he falls in love with a fashion model Dan Feng and marries her. David's sister Mona is in love with his best friend Han Ming, who rejected her as he secretly loves Dan Feng as well. Out of jealousy and hatred, Mona lies to David about a fake affair between Han Ming and Dan Feng...

programme.title: Vengeance Of A Snow Girl
programme.desc: A crippled woman seeks vengeance against the four men who killed her parents. However, when she crosses path with a young warrior who falls in love with her, trouble ensues as his father is one of the killers responsible for her family's massacre years ago.

programme.title: Double Bliss
programme.desc: Dong and Chu plan to get married but their families who are lifelong rivals, disapproved. They decide to fake suicide and eventually get both of their parents to settle their differences and approve the marriage. Concurrently, a record company announces that they will release Dong's songs, leading to double bliss for the couple.

programme.title: The Golden Buddha
programme.desc: A map indicating the location of the Chan's family heirloom is hidden in three Golden Buddha statues. Paul, an insurance agent, finds one statue by chance and Chan's daughter has another one. This makes them targets of treasure-hunting criminals and they have to team up to defeat them before unveiling the hidden secrets.

programme.title: Mist Over Dream Lake
programme.desc: A young girl Chen is sent away by her parents who are going through divorce, to stay with the Chang's. On the Chang's farm, she meets their two sons, the youngest daughter and a young artist, and spends a summer with them that she will never forget.

programme.title: Rolls, Rolls, I Love You
programme.desc: Three young men offend a billionaire and are drawn into a high stakes bet. If they win, they get to keep the billionaire's Rolls Royce. Otherwise, they will need to pay the rich man fifty thousand dollars! Will the underdogs win the bet?

programme.title: Songfest
programme.desc: As its name implies, Songfest is an Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musical, traditionally Chinese and timeless in content, yet revealing a spirited and modern technique. Shot on location at Taiwan's beautiful Sun-Moon Lake, it's a turbulent romance between a passionate tea picker Sung Yu Lan and a charming fisherman Li Chun Yang.

programme.title: The Magnificent Swordsman
programme.desc: The Magnificent Swordsman centres on the hero who vows vengeance against evil bandits who killed his family when he was a child. The hero recruits several friends to help the peasants rid their village of marauding bandits, the leader of the band being the man who killed his family.

programme.title: The Snake Prince
programme.desc: The Snake Prince lives on the Snake Mountain of Kwangsi with other snakes and they have lived peacefully with humans for a thousand years. All things change however, when the Snake Prince falls in love with one of the three beauties performing a sensual rain dance in the nearby village one day, and decides to marry her at all costs...

programme.title: My Dream Boat
programme.desc: This is a story about the complicated love relationships between a group of young friends who are entangled in a web of love and emotions.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperor's sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: When The Clouds Roll By
programme.desc: Su is a schizophrenic who refuses to believe that her pilot lover is killed in a plane crash and makes up stories to deal with things. She runs into an old classmate Lai, who is also a doctor one day, and he finds ways to treat her illness. Su slowly recovers and accepts the reality, as well as her newfound love.

programme.title: Oath Of Death
programme.desc: Three Sung loyalists become blood brothers to fight the tyranny of the Tartar invaders. To oust the oppressors altogether, Ma releases the kidnapped Tartar princess in a strategic effort to gain points with the invaders, but it soon becomes apparent that he desires both a great position and power, and will do anything to get it

programme.title: Dawn Will Come
programme.desc: Liang Cai drugged the beautiful Qiu Rong and raped her, but promised to marry her after getting his parent's consent. Since then, there is no news of his proposal and Qiu Rong confronts Liang Cai when she finds herself pregnant. This is when she discovers that he has already married a rich noble girl and even plans to kill her

programme.title: The Silent Swordsman
programme.desc: This is adapted from Louis Cha's The Book and the Sword. A young swordsman is tasked to lead a patriotic secret society to fight the traitorous general who colludes with the enemy. At the same time, he encounters a female warrior and two beautiful princesses, and is caught between all their affections for him.

programme.title: Young Lovers
programme.desc: Guitar-playing rich kid, Yang Fan, heads to Japan to join a rock 'n' roll band where he soon finds himself competing for the affections of two beautiful girls.

programme.title: Finger Of Doom
programme.desc: The protagonists are ex-swordmasters who now find joy in making umbrellas. They track down the evil Madame Kung Sun and her poisonous Finger of Doom, a unique supernatural power which allows her to transform normal, everyday people into horrifying zombies, and this is just the start of their mythical adventure against this zombie maker!

programme.title: Blue Skies
programme.desc: A young singer Hsiao Yun becomes an overnight sensation after standing in for another singer at the eleventh hour. Her success comes at a heavy price however, when her love with a pianist suffers. On top of this, Hsiao Yun must also deal with the unwanted affections from an influential backer of her show.

programme.title: Death Duel
programme.desc: Third Master is a renowned swordsman in the martial arts world, but the constant challenges by other swordsmen compel him to fake his death and pursue a secluded life. This does not prevent others from seeking him out to challenge him however, and he is forced to return to fight his way till the end.

programme.title: Big Times For The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: Ah Niu finds a bag of jewels on the street and becomes rich. It is at this time that Uncle Zhou asks him to sign a contract to marry a girl, but it turns out to be a trap for Ah Niu to sell his house. In the end, Ah Niu becomes poor again

programme.title: Sheriff Country S1 Ep2

programme.title: Fire Country S4 Ep2
programme.desc: Bode Leone works alongside elite firefighters from Cal Fire and former friends, battling large-scale wildfires while navigating his complex past and personal relationships.

programme.title: Password S2 Ep7
programme.desc: The second season of Password will keep the classic format that we all know and love, while adding some new gameplay elements.

programme.title: KARATE KID: LEGENDS
programme.desc: Karate Kid: Legends unites the iconic martial arts masters of one of the most beloved film franchises of all time to tell a completely new story full of action and heart. When kung fu prodigy Li Fong (Ben Wang) relocates to New York City with his mother to attend a prestigious new school, he finds solace in a new friendship with a classmate and her father. But his newfound peace is short-lived after he attracts unwanted attention from a formidable local karate champion. Driven by a desire to defend himself, Li embarks on a journey to enter the ultimate karate competition. Guided by the wisdom of his kung fu teacher, Mr. Han (Jackie Chan), and the legendary Karate Kid, Daniel LaRusso (Ralph Macchio), Li merges their unique styles to prepare for an epic martial arts showdown.

programme.title: WIPEOUT S9 Ep9
programme.desc: All in a Days Twerk - This week's episode of Wipeout pits our bravest contestants yet battling it out for $25,000. Nurses, an EMT, and a couple of Jarhead Marines try to prove that not all heroes wear capes but they do all wipe out.

programme.title: WIPEOUT S9 Ep10
programme.desc: Cheetahs Never Win - The stakes are even bigger, along with our balls! This week on Wipeout, a DJ and his baller girlfriend spin their way through the competition, but they will have to make it past some barista-siblings, and a couple of animators if they want a shot at the $25,000 prize.

programme.title: BOSTON BLUE S1 Ep2
programme.desc: In BOSTON BLUE, a universe expansion of the long-running top drama BLUE BLOODS, Wahlberg will reprise his role as NYPD officer Danny Reagan as he takes a position with Boston PD. Once in Boston, he is paired with detective Lena Peters, the eldest daughter of a prominent law enforcement family.

programme.title: NCIS: ORIGINS S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Who By Fire - Season 2 of NCIS: Origins delves deeper into the unstoppable NCIS Camp Pendleton team led by the legendary Mike Franks, as well as Gibbs' early career as a special agent, and reveals the fate of Lala after last season's devastating car crash.

programme.title: CSI: VEGAS S3 Ep1
programme.desc: The Reaper - With their respected colleague Josh Folsom under arrest for the death of Kahn Schefter - the man responsible for killing Folsom's mother - the CSI team combs through every crumb of forensic evidence to determine his innocence or guilt.

programme.title: RAINMAKER, THE S1 Ep3
programme.desc: As Rudy and Deck search for a missing nurse, their investigation suggests a dark conspiracy at play.

programme.title: HUNTING PARTY, THE S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Clayton Jessup - Clayton Jessup, a deranged serial killer who targets happy families, is on the loose and looking to kill again.

programme.title: FBI: MOST WANTED S6 Ep22
programme.desc: The Circle Game - The Fugitive Task Force hunts down a rogue government operative planning a domestic terror attack.

programme.title: NCIS: ORIGINS S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Who By Fire - Season 2 of NCIS: Origins delves deeper into the unstoppable NCIS Camp Pendleton team led by the legendary Mike Franks, as well as Gibbs' early career as a special agent, and reveals the fate of Lala after last season's devastating car crash.

programme.title: HELLBOY
programme.desc: This supernatural action-adventure is based on Mike Mignola's acclaimed Dark Horse Comics series. Brought to Earth by evil genius Rasputin (Karel Roden) to aid the Nazis in their dying cause, Hellboy (Ron Perlman) was rescued by Professor Broom (John Hurt), founder of the clandestine B.P.R.D. (Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense), who raised him and developed his extraordinary paranormal gifts. Despite his dark origins, Hellboy becomes an unlikely champion for good, battling the evil forces that threaten our world along with a telepathic mer-man (Doug Jones) and a pyro-kinetic (Selma Blair). Hidden from the society they are assigned to protect, they are the key line of defense against Rasputin, who seeks to reclaim Hellboy to the dark side and use his powers to bring about Armageddon.

programme.title: KARATE KID: LEGENDS
programme.desc: Karate Kid: Legends unites the iconic martial arts masters of one of the most beloved film franchises of all time to tell a completely new story full of action and heart. When kung fu prodigy Li Fong (Ben Wang) relocates to New York City with his mother to attend a prestigious new school, he finds solace in a new friendship with a classmate and her father. But his newfound peace is short-lived after he attracts unwanted attention from a formidable local karate champion. Driven by a desire to defend himself, Li embarks on a journey to enter the ultimate karate competition. Guided by the wisdom of his kung fu teacher, Mr. Han (Jackie Chan), and the legendary Karate Kid, Daniel LaRusso (Ralph Macchio), Li merges their unique styles to prepare for an epic martial arts showdown.

programme.title: EQUALIZER, THE
programme.desc: Denzel Washington plays a former black ops commando who faked his death for a quiet life in Boston. He comes out of his retirement to rescue a young girl, Teri (Chlo Grace Moretz), and finds himself face to face with Russian gangsters.

programme.title: CYRIL: SIMPLY MAGIC S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Singapore (Part 2) - CYRIL: SIMPLY MAGIC

programme.title: BLUE BLOODS S14 Ep11
programme.desc: Life Sentence - The Reagans' professional lives converge when an allegation of jury tampering against Erin intertwines with Danny and Baez's homicide case and Eddie's bond to a child murder witness.

programme.title: BLUE BLOODS S14 Ep12
programme.desc: Without Fear or Favor - Danny joins forces with British investigator Christopher Granger (Jake Weber) to pursue a deadly international fugitive, and Erin faces pressure from her boss, D.A. Crawford (Roslyn Ruff), to secure an indictment against an officer. Also, Jamie investigates a sports gambling website accused of scamming its users, and Frank clashes with Mayor Chase (Dylan Walsh) when the mayor uses his authority to have a retired cop released from jail.

programme.title: FBI S6 Ep7
programme.desc: Behind the Veil - When a bombing at a local restaurant leaves several injured or dead, including a congresswoman and someone close to Isobel, the team races to apprehend the suspect before another explosive goes off.

programme.title: CORONER S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Crispr Sistr - Jenny and Donovan investigate the death of a lab assistant - but Jenny's personal interest in the lab risks clouding the case for her.

programme.title: CSI: VEGAS S3 Ep9
programme.desc: Heavy Metal - The CSI team investigates the death of a local antique shop owner who died from an apparent gunshot wound that is missing one important clue - the bullet. Also, Max makes an important breakthrough in the ongoing case with Ocho from the robotics factory.

programme.title: BLACKLIST, THE S10 Ep10
programme.desc: The Postman - After an inmate opens fire at a high-security prison, the Task Force investigates a contraband smuggler known as The Postman. Cooper revisits his past ties to the suspect.

programme.title: SIGHT UNSEEN S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Jake - When Tess (Dolly Lewis) inserts herself into Jake's (Daniel Gillies) investigation to find the identity of a dead John Doe, she confronts conflicting emotions - fearing for her brother Lucas' (Alec Santos) life while driven to do the thing she loves most: solve the case. Tess continues to resist the traditional sight impaired training offered by her vision loss consultant Mia (Alice Christina-Corrigan), preferring to rely on Sunny's (Agam Darshi) remote guidance - until an unexpected crisis and a nudge from Matt (Jarod Joseph) forces her to reconsider. Meanwhile, Sunny is served divorce papers after failing to meet her husband for a date, leaving her concierge, Kye (Ennis Esmer), as her only real-life contact with the outside world.

programme.title: SIGHT UNSEEN S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Jake - When Tess (Dolly Lewis) inserts herself into Jake's (Daniel Gillies) investigation to find the identity of a dead John Doe, she confronts conflicting emotions - fearing for her brother Lucas' (Alec Santos) life while driven to do the thing she loves most: solve the case. Tess continues to resist the traditional sight impaired training offered by her vision loss consultant Mia (Alice Christina-Corrigan), preferring to rely on Sunny's (Agam Darshi) remote guidance - until an unexpected crisis and a nudge from Matt (Jarod Joseph) forces her to reconsider. Meanwhile, Sunny is served divorce papers after failing to meet her husband for a date, leaving her concierge, Kye (Ennis Esmer), as her only real-life contact with the outside world.

programme.title: CSI: VEGAS S3 Ep9
programme.desc: Heavy Metal - The CSI team investigates the death of a local antique shop owner who died from an apparent gunshot wound that is missing one important clue - the bullet. Also, Max makes an important breakthrough in the ongoing case with Ocho from the robotics factory.

programme.title: CORONER S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Crispr Sistr - Jenny and Donovan investigate the death of a lab assistant - but Jenny's personal interest in the lab risks clouding the case for her.

programme.title: BLUE BLOODS S14 Ep13
programme.desc: Bad to Worse - Frank intervenes when tensions rise between Mayor Chase (Dylan Walsh) and the fire commissioner of New York City (Mira Sorvino). Also, Erin is blindsided when Henry agrees to testify for the defense in a case she is prosecuting, Danny and Baez investigate when human remains are discovered in a storage unit, and Eddie and her partner Badillo navigate a complicated arrest when their criminal offender is scheduled to donate his kidney.

programme.title: CSI: VEGAS S3 Ep1
programme.desc: The Reaper - With their respected colleague Josh Folsom under arrest for the death of Kahn Schefter - the man responsible for killing Folsom's mother - the CSI team combs through every crumb of forensic evidence to determine his innocence or guilt.

programme.title: FBI S6 Ep8
programme.desc: Phantom - After an employee of the U.S. Army is shot in an industrial park, the team works to track down the killer who reveals a larger plot at play. Meanwhile, Tiffany continues to struggle with the guilt surrounding Hobbs' death.

programme.title: SIGHT UNSEEN S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Mia - Jake (Daniel Gillies) encourages Tess (Dolly Lewis) to talk to Superintendent Bennett (Roger Cross) about getting her old job back, but her hopes are cut short by his disappointing offer to join the Metro PD only to ride a desk. Tess isn't about to be used as a PR token when the unsolved murder of a woman killed in her delivery van allows her to bring justice to an overlooked victim whilst proving her old boss wrong. Tess accepts a lesson in cane navigation from Mia (Alice Christina-Corrigan) but Sunny (Agam Darshi) is never far from her ear - except when she gets cut off ... just as Tess goes on a date with a potential killer.

programme.title: CSI: VEGAS S3 Ep10
programme.desc: Tunnel Vision - After an explosion in a bio lab, the CSI team races to determine which nerve agent left one of their own unconscious, while the others explore a dangerous underground tunnel to find another CSI who got kidnapped during the blast.

programme.title: BOSTON BLUE S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Teammates - Lena and Danny are pulled into a high-stakes murder investigation when a whistleblower tied to one of Maes court cases is found dead. Meanwhile, Jonah and Sean prepare for their first official day on the job.

programme.title: S.W.A.T. S4 Ep7
programme.desc: Under Fire - As a sniper begins targeting the L.A. Fire Department, a phone call from Street's (Alex Russell) mother drives a wedge between him and Molly (Laura James). Tan (David Lim) struggles with the T.L.I. Competition.

programme.title: BLUE BLOODS S14 Ep14
programme.desc: New York Minute - Danny and Baez scrutinize an art gallery suspected of selling counterfeit pieces after a detective investigating the establishment is murdered. Also, Eddie is conflicted when she discovers her former partner turned social worker, Rachel Witten (Lauren Patten), crossed the line to get a mentally ill client much needed help, and Frank is upset when an award Danny was to be honored with is rescinded by Grace Edwards (Lori Loughlin), the widow of an NYPD officer killed in the line of duty.

programme.title: BOSTON BLUE S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Teammates - Lena and Danny are pulled into a high-stakes murder investigation when a whistleblower tied to one of Maes court cases is found dead. Meanwhile, Jonah and Sean prepare for their first official day on the job.

programme.title: FBI S6 Ep9
programme.desc: Best Laid Plans - When a retired FBI agent is tortured and killed while working a security job, Scola and Nina (FBI: MOST WANTED) go undercover as a married couple deep in the diamond game as the team tries to find out who is responsible. During the course of his and Nina's dangerous assignment, Scola is plagued by the possibility that their son Doug could end up parentless.

programme.title: SIGHT UNSEEN S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Matt - With Tess (Dolly Lewis) now back on duty with the Metro PD as a police consultant and Sunny (Agam Darshi) as her under the radar tech partner, a murder hits close to home for Tess and Sunny's first 'on the books' case when one of Matt's (Jarod Joseph) colleagues is found dead in the pool where Tess swims. As they investigate the mystery surrounding the swim coach's death and the dynamics of the Olympic-grade swim team, Tess and Sunny discover they were on opposite ends of the popularity scale in school. Mia (Alice Christina-Corrigan) offers her unexpected skills to the case and a shaken Matt sees a new side of Tess, leading to an unexpected moment between them. Meanwhile, Sunny is desperate for help with a DYI job that's gone awry and lets her concierge Kye (Ennis Esmer) into her apartment which reawakens her past fears.

programme.title: NCIS: HAWAI'I S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Run and Gun - After passing her medical and psych evaluations, Tennant is surprised to see Sam Hanna conducting her final interview to clear her return to work. Also, when the team discovers a breach in the U.S. Marshal's database, Sam joins Tennant in Las Vegas to locate the hacker.

programme.title: RAINMAKER, THE S1 Ep4
programme.desc: When Sarah reveals a detail about the case, Rudy must choose between his client and girlfriend.

programme.title: S.W.A.T. S4 Ep8
programme.desc: Crusade - As Deacon (Jay Harrington) wrestles with a big decision about his daughter's future, S.W.A.T. chases a white supremacist group responsible for a series of hate crimes across the city.

programme.title: Salem's Lot Ep02
programme.desc: Part 2 - Novelist Ben Mears returns to his hometown to write about a mysterious mansion that has intrigued him since childhood. But he discovers that the community is slowly becoming a village of vampires.

programme.title: North And South S1 Ep06
programme.desc: Episode 3 (Part 2) - Orry Main, a heir to a Southern plantation, and George Hazard, the son of a Pennsylvania industrialist. See how their friendship grows and discovery of the women they will love for the rest of their lives.

programme.title: Frasier S6 Ep20
programme.desc: Dr. Nora - Frasier is horrified when the soft-spoken lady shrink he urged the station to hire turns out to be a tough-talking tyrant.

programme.title: Frasier S6 Ep21
programme.desc: When a Man Loves Two Women - Frasiers torn between dating his old girlfriend or a voluptuous new flame.

programme.title: Frasier S6 Ep22
programme.desc: Visions of Daphne - To Niles delight, a series of psychic visions gives Daphne second thoughts about marrying Donny.

programme.title: Frasier S6 Ep23
programme.desc: Shutout in Seattle (Part 1) - Despondent over Daphnes engagement, Niles takes a walk on the wild side with a funky waitress from Caf Nervosa.

programme.title: Frasier S6 Ep24
programme.desc: Shutout in Seattle (Part 2) - The love lives of Frasier, Martin, Niles and Roz come crashing down around them.

programme.desc: The Mumbler - Hooker falls back on an old hobby of raising homing pigeons in order to get a young girl to help him bring down a gang of ruthless thieves targeting armored cars.

programme.title: T. J. Hooker S2 Ep16
programme.desc: Vengeance Is Mine - Hookers old partner is determined to avenge the rape of his daughter after the suspect manages to avoid arrest.

programme.title: T. J. Hooker S2 Ep17
programme.desc: Sweet Sixteen and Dead - Hooker sets out to stop a drug and prostitution ringleader from preying on teenage runaways.

programme.title: Xena: Warrior Princess S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Beware Of Greeks Bearing - Xena and Gabrielle arrive to Troy during the Trojan War when she is required by an old friend, Helen. While Xena tries to win the war, Gabrielle meets Perdicas, her ex-fianc, who's working now as a mercenary for Troy.

programme.desc: Athens City Academy Of The Performing Bards - Gabrielle auditions to attend the Athens City Academy to train as a bard -- but others trying for the few open spots include Homer and Euripides.

A tornado outbreak unleashes carnage on Oklahoma, Texas and Louisiana. In Utah, a brushfire threatens to engulf drivers as flames lick the freeway.

programme.title: Planet Earth II S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Cities - Cities are the fastest growing habitat on Earth, but life in the man-made world is not easy for animals. Will the future see cities designed for wildlife too?

programme.title: Snow Dogs: Into the Wild
programme.desc: Wildlife adventurer Gordon Buchanan uses a dog team to retrace the steps of famous arctic explorers and examine the ancient relationship between man and dog. First, Gordon must train his dogs and earn their trust. Next they must learn to travel as a team.

programme.title: Simon Reeve's South America S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Simon travels from the vast white salt flats of Bolivia, through the world's greatest wetlands of Brazil's Pantanal and on to the forested heart of Paraguay.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S4 Ep12
programme.desc: Series 4 - In Texas and Mexico, the first Atlantic hurricane of the season makes landfall, creating dangerous flooding and widespread destruction. A tornado outbreak unleashes carnage on Oklahoma, Texas and Louisiana. In Utah, a brushfire threatens to engulf drivers as flames lick the freeway.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep1
programme.desc: An all-American candy company makes 200,000 packages of red licorice every day; a zippy mayonnaise packs the punch of spicy Sriracha; 40,000 Turkish bourekas are produced every day; and Laceys feature a chocolate centre sandwiched between two wafer-thin cookies.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep2
programme.desc: 1.8 million cherry chews are produced from just one single batch; massive silos of wheat are transformed into 'elbow' macaroni pasta; a continental cranberry cheesecake first started as a Christmas experiment; and meet chakri, the exotic southeast Asian snack that's hand-twirled and fried to crispy perfection.

programme.title: Race Across the World S5 Ep4
programme.desc: Series 5 - The teams discover that their next destination is one of the world's oldest living cities.

programme.title: Snow Dogs: Into the Wild
programme.desc: Wildlife adventurer Gordon Buchanan uses a dog team to retrace the steps of famous arctic explorers and examine the ancient relationship between man and dog. First, Gordon must train his dogs and earn their trust. Next they must learn to travel as a team.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep3
programme.desc: Meet the worker bees who transform raw honey into liquid gold; a California bakery turns out 50,000 loaves of sprouted wheatbread; meet the cookie doctor behind a unique checkerboard creation; and it takes a team of experts to produce irresistible chocolate-covered cherries.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep4
programme.desc: A humble sunflower seed is at the heart of every rainbow-coloured Sunburst candy; a rice vinegar packs a karate kick of flavour; get a tangy taste of Thailand without leaving home; and thousands of bees are behind gourmet caramels.

programme.title: Mammals S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Cold - From ice-covered seas to snow-capped mountains, mammals have conquered the cold.

programme.title: Griff's Great American South S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Charleston - The Old South - Griff explores Charleston's charm, Civil War history, and the legacy of slavery.

programme.title: Earth S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Atmosphere - The almost implausible story of how our life-sustaining atmosphere came to exist.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S12 Ep2
programme.desc: Night Moves - Sue hunts caribou before a big storm approaches. At Calico Bluff Andy and Denise work on building a solar array. At Noorvik village Chip Hailstone performs safety checks on the ice.

programme.title: Mammals S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Cold - From ice-covered seas to snow-capped mountains, mammals have conquered the cold.

programme.title: Planet Earth III S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Coasts - Sir David Attenborough presents Coasts, where two worlds collide and animals battle to survive.

programme.title: Griff's Great American South S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Charleston - The Old South - Griff explores Charleston's charm, Civil War history, and the legacy of slavery.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep5
programme.desc: There's a waterfall of chocolate at a California candy factory; meet the saucy squad behind mountains of cannelloni; find out what it takes to make rice noodles by the truckload; and a hardworking team takes the hassle out of preparing butternut squash.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep6
programme.desc: From tree to bottle, follow the amazing story of maple syrup; there's a 'tower of power' behind a delectable Almond Roca butter toffee popcorn; a British Columbia candy company is giving Turkish Delight a thoroughly modern twist; and find out the secret behind apples that taste like grapes.

programme.title: Big Cats 24/7 S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The lion pride males are injured and the mothers with cubs are left vulnerable after an attack; Xudum, the female leopard, takes risks to find a mate.

programme.title: Anton and Giovanni's Adventures in Sicily S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The second leg of Anton and Giovanni's trip takes them to Mount Etna, Europe's most active volcano, where they are joined by 2021 Strictly champion Rose Ayling-Ellis.

programme.title: Premium Rush: Inside Air Cargo Singapore S1 Ep1
programme.desc: With unprecedented access, Premium Rush: Inside Air Cargo Singapore goes behind-the-scenes at Changi Airfreight Centre - the nerve complex for all-things air cargo - to witness how some of the most time-sensitive and highly coveted shipments reach Singapore on time, every day.

programme.title: Over Australia S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Great Divide - Created by titanic forces and spanning 3,700 km along the eastern edge of Australia, the Great Dividing Range separates two very different worlds. Aerial footage and intimate studies reveal how species survive and thrive in this mountain home.

programme.title: Mysteries Of The Mekong S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Laos: the Mountain Wilds - Steep mountains and tropical monsoons define the Mekong River valley on its route through Laos. Catch glimpses of the wildlife who find refuge in its vibrant ecosystems, from stump-tailed macaques to pied kingfishers to black-crested gibbons.

programme.title: Mysteries Of The Mekong S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Thailand: Coming of Age - The temperate north meets the tropical south along the Mekong's banks in Thailand. Follow the river through the Golden Triangle and see the courtship dances of the region's abundant bird species. Then take in a festival honouring water spirits.

programme.title: Mysteries Of The Mekong S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Karst Caves - Explore the stunning caves of Khammouane province in Laos. These natural wonders, squeezed between the Mekong River and the Annamite Range, are home to part-time and full-time residents, including bats, geckos, frogs, and giant centipedes.

programme.title: Mysteries Of The Mekong S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Nature's Crossroads - As the Mekong River travels down Thailand's eastern border, it sculpts the land, creating hundreds of small waterways through the jungle. Take a trek though lands where rhesus macaques, elephants, and flying foxes live in harmony at the water's edge.

programme.title: Mysteries Of The Mekong S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Thailand: the River Basin - From manicured rice fields to wild tropical rainforests, the Mekong River is the source of life for eastern Thailand. Watch gibbons negotiate family dynamics, and see how the pit viper creates danger for the region's delicate living networks.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep3
programme.desc: The Misfit Comes of Age - If the tiny Nsefu pride is to survive, the teen Misfit and his older brother must quickly perfect their hunting skills. Trek into enemy territory as the lions face dominant rivals and a powerful hyena clan in the search for prey.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Hungry Leopard - A revolutionary thermal camera reveals the secret world of nocturnal predators. Follow along as one of the oldest-known leopards struggles to survive her fearsome neighbors: a pride of scavenging lions.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S1 Ep2
programme.desc: A Leopard's Last Stand - A wise, old leopard reigns over the Luangwa Valley in Zambia. She holds her own against lions, but is about to face her most serious challenge - the arrival of a younger, nomadic female leopard. Witness the bitter battle of experience versus vitality.

programme.title: Snow Leopards With Dan O'neill S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Ghost of the Mountains - Navigate the harsh Mongolian wilderness with Dan as he searches for The Dude, the largest snow leopard ever recorded. Watch him battle hostile landscapes and uncertainty as he sheds light on the challenges that The Dude and other snow leopards face.

programme.title: Survival Of The Beast S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Desert-Adapted Elephant - Trek across the Namibian desert with the bush elephant and learn how it keeps its cool in a place with little food or shade. Discover how this giant consumes specific plants, digs wells, and hikes endless dunes in a quest to find precious water.

programme.title: Big Cats, Small World S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Summer Cubs - Welcome spring on the Gomoti River, where cheetah mum Phefo and lion mum Tshaba teach their cubs survival skills and keep them out of the jaws of the big male cats. See lion king Molelo go into battle while leopard Senatia tries to ensure his legacy.

programme.title: Big Cats, Small World S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Surviving the Flood - Track Molelo's pride, who are exhausted by cub care when the winter floods arrive. Check on the cheetah cubs, who make a difficult decision, and witness a scary encounter that makes leopard mum Sephiri choose between her old family and her new cubs.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep3
programme.desc: The Misfit Comes of Age - If the tiny Nsefu pride is to survive, the teen Misfit and his older brother must quickly perfect their hunting skills. Trek into enemy territory as the lions face dominant rivals and a powerful hyena clan in the search for prey.

programme.title: Big Cats, Small World S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Summer Cubs - Welcome spring on the Gomoti River, where cheetah mum Phefo and lion mum Tshaba teach their cubs survival skills and keep them out of the jaws of the big male cats. See lion king Molelo go into battle while leopard Senatia tries to ensure his legacy.

programme.title: Big Cats, Small World S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Surviving the Flood - Track Molelo's pride, who are exhausted by cub care when the winter floods arrive. Check on the cheetah cubs, who make a difficult decision, and witness a scary encounter that makes leopard mum Sephiri choose between her old family and her new cubs.

programme.title: Baby Animals S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Herd Mentality - Many species of animals are adapted to live in large groups. The group gives them protection from predators, helps them find food and offers plenty of social contact. In this episode of Baby Animals we explore what's it like to grow up in some of these groups.

programme.title: Gladiators S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Waterhole - Witness clashes over precious resources when the dry season brings a band of gladiators to an African savannah watering hole. See a lion-elephant territory brawl, an ant raid on a termite mound, and a honey badger's risky dance with a deadly snake.

programme.title: Gladiators S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Wild Coast - Go up against Australia's wiliest gladiators and their impressive arsenals. Learn if these weapons, such as the kangaroo's deadly boxing moves and the redback spider's precision-engineered traps, can help them survive the ravages of climate change.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Kings of Nsefu - Twin brothers with a powerful bond have ruled the Nsefu pride for three years. They're fathers to all the young, and protectors of their territory. Witness the struggle that unfolds when rival males target their territory.

programme.title: Beasts Of The Big Blue S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Three Kings Islands/ Manawat?whi - Delve into the strange magic of the Three Kings Islands, a remote archipelago north of New Zealand. Swim with a pod of bottlenose dolphins, join short-tailed stingrays on a hunt, and feel the tension as a gang of predatory orcas arrives on the scene.

programme.title: Beasts Of The Big Blue S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Cook Islands/ K?ki 'Airani - Travel to the Cook Islands, the destination of choice for 3,000 humpback whales ready to mate and raise their young. Witness giant clams and green turtles thriving in the islands' massive coral reef and get a glimpse into our evolutionary past.

programme.title: Great Parks Of Africa S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Hluhluwe-Imfolozi - In the heart of Zululand, South Africa, lies the oldest game reserve on the African continent - Hluhluwe-iMfolozi. Here, Southern white rhinos have found protection from people in times of turmoil. Hunted almost to extinction at the end of the 19th century, the park's establishment gave rhinos a lifeline - breeding them back from extinction.

programme.title: Mysteries Of The Mekong S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Cambodia: Hidden Refuges - Bisected by the Mekong's mighty waters, Cambodia is defined by its relationship to this great river. See why the country is a biodiversity hot spot and explore the secret refuges of animal populations that survive in its untouched natural habitats.

programme.title: Gladiators S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Waterhole - Witness clashes over precious resources when the dry season brings a band of gladiators to an African savannah watering hole. See a lion-elephant territory brawl, an ant raid on a termite mound, and a honey badger's risky dance with a deadly snake.

programme.title: Baby Animals S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Endangered Species - Animals that were once near extinction find refuge in the safety of zoos. Celebrate the birth of red pandas, twin snow leopard cubs, a southern white rhino, and a Sulawesi macaque, all species that are endangered in the wild.

programme.title: Beasts Of The Big Blue S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Three Kings Islands/ Manawat?whi - Delve into the strange magic of the Three Kings Islands, a remote archipelago north of New Zealand. programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Einstein Must Go! - Get to know the Waterfront Pride: males Tom Tom and Caller, 8 lionesses, 10 youths, and Einstein, the grown cub who never left home. Watch Einstein's defiance catch up with him when rivals from the Outsiders Pride make a play that seals his fate.

programme.title: Into The Wild Colombia S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Romeo and Julieta - This is the story of Julieta, a female golden dart frog, in search of her Romeo. She's about to lay her eggs and must find a male to fertilize them. Romeo's calls guide her through the forest, but crossing the dense rainforest is no easy feat.

programme.title: America's Wild Border: Northern Exposure
programme.desc: Trail Atlantic puffins, Prairie rattlesnakes, Alaskan caribou and other animals as they travel across the international boundary between the U.S. and Canada. See how they can move from safety to target by crossing a line they had no say in creating.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Rhythm of the Bay - The Hudson Bay lowlands are part of North America's largest wetland. Over 300,000 square kilometers of muskeg, a vast bogland as far as the eye can see characterized by water soaked peat, mosses and stunted trees. Once thought of as barren wasteland, it is now understood that these bogs are crucially important to life on earth. Globally, there is as much carbon dioxide held in wetlands as there is in the atmosphere.The peatland ecosystem is the most efficient carbon sink on the planet.

programme.title: Mysteries Of The Mekong S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Cambodia: Seasonal Cycles - The Mekong is Cambodia's lifeline, especially during the scorching dry season, when precious moisture is hard to come by. Learn how all manner of flying creatures, from birds to bats, manage resources until the rainy season brings sweet relief.

programme.title: Beasts Of The Big Blue S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Three Kings Islands/ Manawat?whi - Delve into the strange magic of the Three Kings Islands, a remote archipelago north of New Zealand. programme.title: Cub Camp S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Goodbye Campers - Prepare for the summer cubs' release with Roger, then meet Ace and Little Blueberry, two newbies with serious health issues who will have to stay over the winter with the Z cubs. Later, celebrate as six healthy, happy bears embark on their new life.

programme.desc: Einstein Must Go! - Get to know the Waterfront Pride: males Tom Tom and Caller, 8 lionesses, 10 youths, and Einstein, the grown cub who never left home. Watch Einstein's defiance catch up with him when rivals from the Outsiders Pride make a play that seals his fate.

programme.desc: Romeo and Julieta - This is the story of Julieta, a female golden dart frog, in search of her Romeo. She's about to lay her eggs and must find a male to fertilize them. Romeo's calls guide her through the forest, but crossing the dense rainforest is no easy feat.

programme.title: America's Wild Border: Northern Exposure
programme.desc: Trail Atlantic puffins, Prairie rattlesnakes, Alaskan caribou and other animals as they travel across the international boundary between the U.S. and Canada. See how they can move from safety to target by crossing a line they had no say in creating.

programme.title: Rachel Khoo: My Swedish Kitchen S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Fishing on the Westcoast - Rachel serves a grilled lobster with a cabbage and caraway salad. Then she makes her own gravlax poke bowl, and for desserts she prepares white chocolate berry coconut mountains.

programme.title: Nigella's Cook, Eat, Repeat S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Should you meddle with a classic? Nigella thinks that in the case of her crab mac'n'cheese, it's a must. She also cooks up chocolate cookies, chicken with orzo and a rice-filled dessert.

programme.title: Big Zuu & AJ Tracey's Rich Flavours S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Highlands - Up in Bonnie Scotland, Zuu and AJ head to the luxury 'old money' estates of the rich and high society. They eat the most expensive haggis in the world (coming in at 4000), sample scotch whiskey, ride carriages, go fishing and hunting, before putting their own spin on classic Scottish cuisine.

programme.title: George Clarke's Old House New Home S8 Ep1
programme.desc: Southwick and Southport - Duncan and Josie attempt to transform their 18th-century barn into a liveable family home. And can Jenny restore a Victorian gothic pile in Southport to its former glory?

programme.title: Grand Designs S21 Ep1
programme.desc: Wye Valley - In the Wye Valley, Rosa and Craig battle the never-ending elements to convert a family-owned, century-old, decommissioned steam railway reservoir into a unique living space.

programme.title: The Great Home Transformation S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Series 1, Episode 5 - Emma and Nick head to Edinburgh to help artist Jade and musician Joe get to grips with small-space living in their two-bedroom flat. Can the team transform cramped chaos into a harmonious home?

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby S4 Ep4
programme.desc: Nimb Hotel, Copenhagen - Monica and Giles travel to a hotel in Copenhagen that aims to deliver complete happiness. They visit Nimb Hotel in the historic Tivoli Gardens, where Monica dives to clean a vast tropical aquarium.

programme.title: Grand Indian Hotel S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Udaipur - In the romantic city of Udaipur, the devoted staff prepare for a secret marriage proposal. And some VIP guests receive a royal welcome. Documentary series about the most exclusive chain of hotels in India, the Oberoi.

programme.title: Million Dollar Buffet
programme.desc: The All You Eat Buffet takes a luxury turn. It's a brave new world of $10,000 sides of wagyu beef, foie-gras mac n cheese, Alaska king crab claws piled high and 20,000 gold leaf topped crme brles.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Hang in There, Baby - When Mega Fat CEO Baby claims he has dirt that could get Boss Baby fired, Boss Baby and the team try to find a way to get it first!

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Dr. Catastrophe - During an attempt to get displaced Fire Gronckles back to their native Fire Realm, D'Angelo makes a mistake by accidentally feeding them Catastrophic Quaken eggs.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep18
programme.desc: It Flies in the Family - Eugene discovers the Lair and demands a dragon of his own.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Unholy Dragon Returns to the Mountains - Jindiao takes Po and the kids hostage in an attempt to locate the Wellspring

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Sacrifice at the Edge of Time - The kids are desperate to get back and help their fellow Panda Villagers, and Po decides he must figure out a way to defeat Jindiao before he controls the world

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Mouse - Artephius tries to warn the town when an evil mouse charms his way into San Lorenzo - but no one will listen to him.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Goblin - Cleevil, an orphan goblin, seeks refuge in San Lorenzo - but, unbeknownst to Puss, he is in cahoots with the Duchess.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Wu You Gonna Call? - After the reveal of magical creatures' existence and Yi's magic ability in at the end of Season 1, the city's citizens are unsure how to feel about this new revelation. A popular vlogger, Bryan Wu, sets out to capture viral-worthy footage of creatures and magic, under the guise of helping Yi and her friends get out their creature awareness message. Yi and the crew must step in when Bryan puts himself and creatures alike in peril in his pursuit of clickbait.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 Ep12
programme.desc: The Ditch Sitch - The crew gets their first ping on their new creature-helping app! A dried up jellyfish-type creature has been discovered at a construction site, and the anti-creature contractor wants it GONE. The crew try taking Jelleen to the sewers to live with Sewer Koi, but the unhappy creature creates a blackout in the sewers with its magical electric charge. Realizing that Jelleen should be able to stay in her original home, the crew must stand up against the contractor and force her to see the error of her ways or else!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Kitty Rangers - Kitty Ranger Team Leader Mama Box helps Kitty Ranger Gabby and Pandy get a lost Baby Me-Owl back home to its Mama in the Fairy Tale Garden. They embark on a hiking adventure! They learn about animal tracking, earn patches along the way, and ultimately, reunite Baby with Mama!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Meow-Mazing Games - When Gabby, Pandy, and Carlita prepare for the annual Meow-Mazing Games, they encounter stiff competition from the Doodads and must work together to bring home the coveted dollhouse trophy.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Pandy's Birthday - It's Pandy's birthday!! The dollhouse is throwing a surprise party for him! Gabby goes room to room preparing all his favorite things for the party, but when the big moment comes, Pandy drops his cake! Gabby consoles him and tells him it's even better - now, they have smash cake! They all hold up a piece and pose for a picture.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Straycation Part II - While the parents are away, the kids are in charge of the tree house, but when the punch monkeys invade the house, the kids find themselves out of their element.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Thunder Misters - Jealous of the Thunder Sisters, the men on the farm undergo a series of difficult initiation rituals to try and join the exclusive tribe of women.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Eep loves action and adventure - it's in her blood. But when Eep starts adventuring in her sleep, she has to try to find the cause of her new sleep walking to avoid ending up in dangerous situations.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep1
programme.desc: First Flight: Part 1 - Moving to an exotic new home, an adventurous teenager meets a new group of kids and discovers a dragon in the fissure.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep2
programme.desc: First Flight: Part 2 - Tom forges a friendship with the dragon and discovers an entire world of dragons within the fissure.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep3
programme.desc: A Hole New World - Tom and Jun encounter unexpected dangers and are separated while exploring the Hidden Realm of dragons. Tom introduces Jun to the dragon world, and Jun bonds with a dragon of her own - Wu and Wei.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Harmful Horrors of the Harrowing Hiveschool - After injecting all the teachers with bee DNA, the Melvins run the new "hivemind" of the school. But Ms. Ribble is accidently injected with too much "Bee- NA" and becomes the queen bee, overpowering the Melvins' control. George, Harold and the recently re-hired Vice Principal Krupp must work with the Melvins and stop her from turning everyone into her Zombees.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Preposterous Pulverizing of the Pestering Poopacabra - In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Dastardlys Deed of the Devious Diddlysaurus - George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 Ep65
programme.desc: Biscuits Rising - Lured into an empty hotel where a baby has supposedly gone missing, the team is trapped by Crispin Biscuits, a chaotic British schoolboy baby who's been hired to wreck Boss and Tina's lives. Crispin puts the new company's loyalty to a test in a series of fiendish puzzling mind games, all with the threat of constant balloon popping (horrible for baby ears!)

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 Ep66
programme.desc: Moon Shot - Our team's startup company and their rivals at Baby Corp get in a Space Race, competing to see who can make the cutest kiddie-pretend moon landing for a baby - a spectacle sure to bring in a bounty of Baby Love. With both companies pouring their resources into a simulated space take off, tempers and sabotage are running hot, and the scrappy little startup is in danger of getting crushed by their big business competitor.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 Ep67
programme.desc: Inner Children - JJ reluctantly lets Tina take over her assistant duties for the day, but a Tina slip-up leads to an outbreak of town adults drinking diluted special formula that makes them all baby-brained. When JJ discovers this, she works with R & D Baby Simmons and Security Baby Katja to antidote the wobbling Adult Babies before Tina can find out and blame herself.
